content: धारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [धृ-णिनि] {@--1@} Carrying, bearing, sustaining, preserving, having, holding, supporting; पादांभोरुहधारि <ls>Gīt. 12</ls>; कर° &c. {@--2@} Keeping in one's memory, possessed of retentive memory; अज्ञेभ्यो ग्रंथिनः श्रेष्ठा ग्रंथिभ्यो धारिणो वराः <ls>Ms. 12. 103.</ls> {@--3@} Edged.
